definition: guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

pinyin: bao3 zheng4 po4 huai4 zhan4 lu:e4

definition: collateralized debt obligation (CDO), type of bond
pinyin: zhai4 wu4 dan1 bao3 zheng4 quan4
Xiang1 hu4 Bao3 zheng4 Hui3 mie4
zi1 chan3 dan1 bao3 zheng4 quan4

sentences.english: It allows both partners to keep their virginity intact for their wedding night.
sentences.chinese: 它保證了伴侶雙方初夜之前都是處子之身。

sentences.english: All kinds of protective device make sure tranverse mobile platform safe running .
sentences.chinese: 多種安全保護裝置保證移車平臺安全運行。

sentences.english: If no domain is registered, the money is refunded in full.
sentences.chinese: 如果客戶沒有註冊任何域名，那麼保證金將全部返還。

sentences.english: They promised her she would soon be rich beyond her wildest dreams.
sentences.chinese: 他們向她保證很快她就會變得超乎想像的富有。

sentences.english: International business English teaching quality hearing can not be guaranteed.
sentences.chinese: 國際商務英語聽力教學質量無法保證。

sentences.english: Made of natural coconut, keep your lovely pets growing with healthy and fun.
sentences.chinese: 純天然椰殼製成，保證愛寵健康快樂成長。

sentences.english: The financial supervision is an important means for guaranteeing the orderly implementation of the financial activities.
sentences.chinese: 財務監督是保證財務活動有序進行的重要手段。

sentences.english: Go see it-I guarantee it'll knock your socks off!
sentences.chinese: 你得去看看，保證會讓你激動萬分的。

sentences.english: Some of the most popular expressions are those that are guaranteed not to offend anyone.
sentences.chinese: 一些最流行的表達是那些保證不會得罪任何人的表達。

sentences.english: Reduce the set cost of customers and increase the after-sales service guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 減少客戶的成套成本，增加售後服務保證。

sentences.english: With the same as Hollywood, the star is the important insurance ofthe Hong Kong movie booking office.
sentences.chinese: 與好萊圬一樣，明星是香港電影票房的重要保證。

sentences.english: Kratos: You will pay for this Zeus, be certain of that.
sentences.chinese: 你將會爲此付出代價的，宙斯，我保證。

sentences.english: The natural forest conversation project is an important guarantee for sustainable forest development.
sentences.chinese: 天然林保護工程是森林可持續發展的重要保證。

sentences.english: But yesterday I promised him to work harder.
sentences.chinese: 但是，昨天我向他保證要更用功唸書。

sentences.english: Idou't promise to ask you to stop…But I can run with you.
sentences.chinese: 我不保證會使你笑，但我可以陪着你一起哭。

sentences.english: All the cartons are lined with plastic sheets， so they're absolutely water-proof， I can assure you.
sentences.chinese: 所有紙箱都內襯塑料袋，我可以保證絕對防水。

definition: to promise/to undertake to do something/commitment
in no way/not in the least/absolutely not
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
to be capable of/to be able to/can
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
